seed_pair.known: How do you say this word in Chinese?
seed_pair.target: 你怎么用中文说这个词？

practice_phrases: 这个词。
This word.
这个词是什么？
What is this word?
我不介意这个词。
I don't mind this word.
你能说这个词吗？
Can you say this word?
你怎么用中文说这个词？
How do you say this word in Chinese?
你能告诉我这个词是什么吗？
Can you tell me what this word is?
我不介意明天早上说这个词，你想在哪里见面？
I don't mind saying this word tomorrow morning, where do you want to meet?
你想今晚去餐厅用中文说这个词吗？
Do you want to go to a restaurant tonight and say this word in Chinese?
我下个月不能在那里说这个词，所以我们谈点别的吧。
I won't be able to say this word there next month, so let's talk about something else.
如果我知道你想要什么，我会做得不同，我会用完全相同的方式说这个词。
If I had known what you wanted, I would have done it differently, I would have said this word in exactly the same way.

你能在星期天早上给我说这个词吗？
can you say this word to me on Sunday morning?

如果我知道，我会用中文说
if I had known, I would have said it in Chinese
你能在星期天早上用中文说那本书吗？
can you say that book in Chinese on Sunday morning?
